mapper.sql: id, name, sex, idcard, mobile, address, photo, employstatus,hiredate,leavedate,fingerprint,drilicence,fstdrilicdate,dripermitted,teachpermitted, procertificate,prolevel, cuid,muid,ctime,mtime
mapper.update: update t_assessor set isdel=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_assessor (name, sex, idcard, mobile, address, photo, fingerprint, drilicence,fstdrilicdate,expiredate,dripermitted,teachpermitted, staffid,cuid,ctime,procertificate,prolevel, employstatus, hiredate, leavedate ) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fingerprint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drilicence},#{fstdrilicdate},#{expiredate},#{dripermitted},#{teachpermitted}, #{staffid},#{cuid},now(),#{procertificate},#{prolevel}, #{employstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hiredate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leavedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_assessor set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employstatus = #{employstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hiredate = #{hiredate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, leavedate = #{leavedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fingerprint = #{fingerprint}, drilicence = #{drilicence}, fstdrilicdate = #{fstdrilicdate}, expiredate = #{expiredate}, dripermitted = #{dripermitted}, teachpermitted = #{teachpermitted}, procertificate=#{procertificate}, prolevel=#{prolevel}, muid=#{muid} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
